title: 1 Golden Visitor
subtitle: One morning, a butterfly lands on your window... What do you do?

options.next: You sprint outside, but the butterfly flutters just out of reach. It's like it's teasing you!
options.friend: 'Whoa, slow down! You trying to race a butterfly now?'

options.next: You lean on the windowsill, watching as it flaps its golden wings, almost like it's saying hello.
options.friend: 'Kinda feels like a tiny piece of sunshine, huh?'

options.next: You observe carefully—its wings seem fine, and it's just resting there. No danger.
options.friend: 'Smart move. No sudden moves, or we'll spook it!'

options.next: You wiggle your fingers, mimicking its tiny movements. It flutters in response—maybe it really is playing?
options.friend: 'Okay, okay! But what if it actually understands you?!'

title: 2 A Friend in Need
subtitle: Following the golden butterfly outside, you see your friend sitting alone under a tree... What do you do?

options.next: You wrap them in a bear hug, squeezing tight. They stiffen for a second—then relax.
options.friend: 'Okay, okay! I get it! You're secretly a hug monster!'

options.next: You start moving like a complete goofball. It's ridiculous… and completely effective.
options.friend: 'STOP— I can't— breathe— from laughing!'

options.next: You sit beside them, saying nothing. Sometimes, silence speaks the loudest.
options.friend: '...Thanks. I needed that.'

options.next: You point at the butterfly. Its golden wings shimmer in the sunlight.
options.friend: 'You think it's a sign? Like… maybe things will be okay?'

title: 3 The Glinting Mystery
subtitle: While hanging out with your friend, something shiny catches your eye in the tree roots... Whachudu?

options.next: You start digging like your life depends on it. The shiny thing gets clearer!
options.friend: 'GO GO GO! You're like a treasure hunter!'

options.next: You examine the ground carefully. There's something odd about how it's buried…
options.friend: 'Ooooh, detective mode activated!'

options.next: You wave your arms. 'Guys, check this out!' Soon, everyone is gathered around.
options.friend: 'Ohhh, now it's a group mystery. Love it!'

options.next: No hesitation. You reach in and yank it out—whatever it is, it's yours now!
options.friend: 'Whoa, okay, that was bold!'

title: 4 The Key and the Paw Prints
subtitle: After digging around the roots, you find a mysterious key! And there are fresh paw prints nearby… What now?

options.next: You crouch to examine the prints. They lead deeper into the trees…
options.friend: 'Detective mode: engaged! Let's crack this case!'

options.next: You excitedly follow the tracks, not worrying where they lead.
options.friend: 'Wait up, you speed demon!'

options.next: You gather everyone. No adventure should be tackled alone!
options.friend: 'Yes! Team adventure, let's do this!'

options.next: You take charge and start walking. If there's a mystery, you'll be the first to face it.
options.friend: 'Captain, I await your orders!'

title: 5 The Vined Gate
subtitle: Following the mysterious paw prints through the trees leads you to an old gate covered in vines… What do you do?

options.next: You take a moment to look around. No signs of danger… but the air feels different here.
options.friend: 'What if this is, like, some ancient trap?'

options.next: You start pulling at the vines, revealing an old, rusted lock underneath.
options.friend: 'Jungle cleanup squad, reporting for duty!'

options.next: You inspect the lock closely. It definitely looks like it needs that key…
options.friend: 'Bet it's not just a regular lock. Maybe a puzzle?'

options.next: You shake the key in front of the lock, hoping for some magic effect.
options.friend: 'Yeah, just wiggle it enough and maybe it'll open by itself!'

title: 6 The Hidden Garden
subtitle: The key fits perfectly! As the gate creaks open, you discover a secret garden, but there are strange rustling sounds... What do you do?

options.next: You grab a sturdy branch and hold your ground. Whatever's rustling, it won't catch you off guard.
options.friend: 'Okay, bodyguard mode. I feel safer already!'

options.next: You whisper, 'Stealth mission time!' and crouch behind some bushes.
options.friend: 'Operation: Sneaky Snoopers is a go!'

options.next: You push aside some branches, making room for a better view.
options.friend: 'Pathfinder status: unlocked!'

options.next: You motion for everyone to stay close. Safety in numbers, after all.
options.friend: 'Yeah, not about to get lost in some enchanted forest!'

title: 7 The Fountain's Secret
subtitle: As you explore the overgrown garden, you spot something mysterious at the bottom of an old fountain… What's the plan?

options.next: You don't think twice—SPLASH! You're now knee-deep in mystery.
options.friend: 'DID YOU JUST— okay, wow, respect!'

options.next: You roll up your sleeves and reach in carefully. No unnecessary risks.
options.friend: 'Yeah, let's NOT test if there's a swamp monster down there…'

options.next: You and your friend work together to reach the shining object.
options.friend: 'Teamwork makes the dream work!'

options.next: You cheer, 'We got this!' The excitement is contagious.
options.friend: 'Okay, okay! I'm feeling the hype now!'

title: 8 The Coming Storm
subtitle: Just as you retrieve a mysterious map from the fountain, thunder rumbles overhead… What now?

options.next: You stare down the storm like a hero in an epic tale.
options.friend: 'Alright, main character energy!'

options.next: You quickly look for a safe place to wait it out.
options.friend: 'Yeah, I'd rather not become a lightning rod today…'

options.next: You reassure everyone, reminding them that storms always pass.
options.friend: 'You always know what to say, huh?'

options.next: You stretch out your hands—free shower! No big deal.
options.friend: 'Rain enthusiast over here!'

title: 9 The Cozy Cave
subtitle: The rain starts falling heavily, but the map shows a nearby cave where you can stay dry… How do you chill?

options.next: You stand at the entrance, just in case something unexpected happens.
options.friend: 'Knight of the Cozy Cave, I salute you!'

options.next: You launch into an epic tale, your friend listening intently.
options.friend: 'Ooooh, keep going!'

options.next: You stretch out on the cave floor, soaking in the peaceful sounds of rain.
options.friend: 'Kinda nice, actually.'

options.next: You start stacking rocks into little towers.
options.friend: 'Cave rock art contest? You're on!'

title: 10 The Treasure Awakens
subtitle: As the storm clears, you check the map again and notice an X marking this very spot! What's next?

options.next: You grab a stick and start digging. Time to see what's buried!
options.friend: 'Treasure hunter mode: activated!'

options.next: You scan the area first. Could be a trap, after all.
options.friend: 'Ooooh, good thinking. What if it's cursed?!'

options.next: You and your friend take turns digging. Team effort!
options.friend: 'Double the hands, double the speed!'

options.next: You pretend to be a pirate captain, commanding the dig.
options.friend: 'Aye aye, cap'n! Let's find some gold!'

title: 11 The Chest of Echoes
subtitle: Your digging pays off as you uncover an ancient chest, but suddenly it starts speaking?!

options.next: You throw the lid open—let's see what's inside!
options.friend: 'Mystery chest, here we go!'

options.next: You cautiously ask, 'Uh… hello?'
options.friend: 'Okay, but what if it talks back?!'

options.next: You give it a friendly knock. Might as well be polite.
options.friend: 'Are we seriously knocking on a chest right now?!'

options.next: You turn to your friend. 'Your call!'
options.friend: 'Oh wow, uh, okay… no pressure!'

title: 12 The Final Choice
subtitle: The chest opens on its own, revealing a glowing stone that speaks to you: 'What do you seek?'

options.next: The stone hums, and suddenly… a new map appears in your hands!
options.friend: 'More quests? Heck yes!'

options.next: The stone glows, filling your mind with stories of the past.
options.friend: 'Whoa… did you just time-travel in your brain?'

options.next: The stone vanishes, leaving behind a bracelet for both of you.
options.friend: 'Okay, not gonna lie, that's kinda beautiful.'

options.next: The stone bursts into a swirl of colors, revealing another hidden path…
options.friend: 'Wait—there's more?! Let's go!!'

title: 13 The Journey Continues…
subtitle: After receiving your magical reward, you look at each other, ready to head home... or are you?

options.next: You smile. This was an adventure to remember.
options.friend: 'Best. Day. Ever.'

options.next: You pull out your journal, already plotting the next journey.
options.friend: 'Oh boy, here we go again!'

options.next: You take a deep breath, thinking about everything you've learned.
options.friend: 'Kinda wild how much we discovered, huh?'

options.next: You and your friend high-five. This adventure deserves a party!
options.friend: 'YES! Adventure celebration time!'
